statements: SELECT * FROM returned_items
SELECT item_name, return_date, refund_amount FROM returned_items WHERE return_status = 'approved'
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE inspection_status = 'pending' ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM returned_items WHERE refund_amount > 50.00
SELECT AVG(refund_amount) AS average_refund FROM returned_items WHERE return_status = 'approved'
SELECT item_id, item_name, return_date FROM returned_items WHERE return_status = 'pending' ORDER BY return_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE inspection_status = 'failed' AND refund_amount > 1000 ORDER BY item_id ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, return_date, refund_amount FROM returned_items WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT item_id, item_name, refund_amount FROM returned_items WHERE return_status = 'approved' AND refund_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY refund_amount DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT item_id, return_date, refund_amount FROM returned_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%chair%' ORDER BY return_date ASC
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE status='Returned';
SELECT item_name, status FROM returned_items WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT duration_minutes, stage_name FROM logistics_stages WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM logistics_stages ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT item_name, status FROM returned_items WHERE status='Returned' AND item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT item_name, status, item_id FROM returned_items WHERE status='returned';
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT stage_name, duration_minutes FROM logistics_stages WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_stages WHERE stage_id = 3;
SELECT item_id, status, item_name FROM returned_items ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_id, return_date, status FROM returned_items WHERE status = 'processed';
SELECT return_date, status FROM returned_items ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_processing WHERE processing_status = 'completed';
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_date, shipping_status FROM return_shipping WHERE shipping_status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_id, return_date, returned_by, status FROM returned_items WHERE status = 'processed';
SELECT item_id, return_date, returned_by FROM returned_items ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, processing_date, processing_location, processing_status FROM return_processing WHERE processing_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM return_shipping ORDER BY shipping_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedItems;
SELECT item_name, return_date FROM ReturnedItems;
SELECT id, return_reason FROM ReturnedItems ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inspection WHERE inspector='John Doe';
SELECT id, technician, repair_description FROM Repair ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedItems;
SELECT id, item_name, return_date FROM ReturnedItems WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, return_reason FROM ReturnedItems WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT id, repair_date, technician FROM Repair ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector, inspection_result FROM Inspection WHERE inspector = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT return_status, return_timestamp FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_id, return_status FROM returned_items WHERE return_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM return_inspection ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT disposition_type, disposed_by, disposal_timestamp FROM return_disposition WHERE disposition_type = 'Recycle';
SELECT * FROM returned_items ORDER BY return_timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_id, return_status, return_timestamp FROM returned_items WHERE return_status = 'approved';
SELECT rp.item_id, rp.processing_stage, ri.return_timestamp FROM returned_items ri JOIN return_processing rp ON ri.item_id = rp.item_id WHERE rp.processing_stage = 'inspection';

SELECT ri.item_id, rd.resolution_status, rd.resolution_timestamp FROM returned_items ri JOIN return_resolution rd ON ri.item_id = rd.return_id WHERE rd.resolution_status = 'resolved' ORDER BY rd.resolution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_inspection WHERE inspection_date >= '2023-01-01' AND inspection_date <= '2023-02-28';
